trans-unit.source: The abstract base class that defines the properties and methods of a security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 定义安全令牌服务 (STS) 的属性和方法的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: To create an STS you must derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的 STS 必须派生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>类。

trans-unit.source: In your custom class you must, at a minimum, override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在你自定义类必须在最低限度上，重写<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: With these overrides, the STS created using the default implementation of all the other methods defined in the class is capable of issuing security tokens in response to security token requests (RST).
trans-unit.target: 通过这些重写，使用的类中定义的所有其他方法的默认实现创建 STS 是能够颁发安全令牌来响应安全令牌请求 (RST)。

trans-unit.source: That is, the Issue binding defined in the WS-Trust specification is implemented.
trans-unit.target: 即，实现 Ws-trust 规范中定义的问题绑定。

trans-unit.source: This binding is implemented in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现此绑定<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: None of the other WS-Trust bindings (Renew, Cancel, and Validate) are implemented in the default case and an appropriate fault is returned to the caller if an RST that corresponds to one of these bindings is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下实现的任何其他 WS 信任绑定 （续订、 取消和验证） 和相应的错误返回给调用方，如果遇到 RST 对应的这些绑定之一。

trans-unit.source: You can, of course, override the appropriate methods (<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Renew%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Cancel%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Validate%2A>) to implement these bindings in your STS.
trans-unit.target: 当然，可以重写适当的方法 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Renew%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Cancel%2A>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Validate%2A>) 在 STS 中实施这些绑定。

trans-unit.source: Implementing a production-ready STS entails careful planning and considerable resources to mitigate the potential security risks inherent in exposing such a service.
trans-unit.target: 实现生产就绪 STS 需要仔细的规划和相当多的资源来缓解潜在的安全风险固有在公开此类服务。

trans-unit.source: Most developers using Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) will be developing applications that outsource identity management to an STS, rather than developing an STS itself.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 的大多数开发人员将开发外包到 STS，标识管理的应用程序而不是本身开发 STS。

trans-unit.source: WIF provides a Visual Studio extension, the Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012, to help developers test solutions in the development environment.
trans-unit.target: WIF 提供了一个 Visual Studio 扩展，标识和访问工具对于 Visual Studio 2012，以帮助开发人员在开发环境中测试解决方案。

trans-unit.source: This tool includes an STS, `LocalSTS`, that you can configure to serve specific claims to the application that you are developing.
trans-unit.target: 此工具包含 STS， `LocalSTS`，你可以对其进行配置以提供到你正在开发的应用程序的特定声明。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Identity and Access tool, see [Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012](~/docs/framework/security/identity-and-access-tool-for-vs.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关标识和访问工具的详细信息，请参阅[标识和访问工具用于 Visual Studio 2012](~/docs/framework/security/identity-and-access-tool-for-vs.md)。

trans-unit.source: In some scenarios, `LocalSTS` may not provide the functionality necessary to adequately test your application; for example, in a scenario that involves developing a custom token handler for use by an application.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，`LocalSTS`可能无法提供充分测试你的应用程序所必需的功能; 例如，在涉及的方案中开发应用程序使用的自定义令牌处理程序。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, you can derive from <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> to create one or more simple STSs that can be deployed in your development environment and that can be used to test such features in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，你可以派生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>创建一个或多个简单 Sts，可以在开发环境中部署并可用来在你的应用程序中测试此类功能。

trans-unit.source: The rest of this section focuses on the methods exposed by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class that enable you to implement a simple STS and extend the token issuance pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 本部分的其余部分侧重于通过公开的方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>可用于实现简单的 STS 和扩展令牌颁发管道的类。

trans-unit.source: The following list provides a brief overview of the methods of primary importance to the developer for use in a test or development environment.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表提供最为重要的方法的简要概述向开发人员在测试或开发环境中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope> object that contains information about the RP.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope>包含 RP 有关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: This object is used in the rest of the token issuance pipeline and includes information about the signing and encrypting credentials to use in the response, as well as the `AppliesTo` and `ReplyTo` (if required) addresses.
trans-unit.target: 此对象使用的令牌发出管道的其余部分中，并包含有关签名和加密凭据以在响应中，使用信息以及`AppliesTo`和`ReplyTo`（如果需要） 地址。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> object that contains the claims to return to the RP.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>包含要返回到 RP 的声明的对象。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the token request pipeline, which processes an incoming security token request (RST) and returns a response (RSTR) to the caller that contains a token that can be used to authenticate with an RP.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现令牌请求管道，后者处理传入安全令牌请求 (RST) 并返回包含一个令牌，可用于使用 RP 进行身份验证调用方的响应 (RSTR)。

trans-unit.source: Many of the other methods defined in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class are called from this method, including the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 其他方法中定义的许多<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>类调用此方法，包括<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to override this method, but an understanding of the token request pipeline it implements may be helpful.
trans-unit.target: 无需重写此方法，但它实现令牌请求管道了解可能很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: An STS is configured through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> class.
trans-unit.target: 通过配置 STS<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>类。

trans-unit.source: The code examples that are used in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample.
trans-unit.target: 在中使用的代码示例<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>主题，将从`Custom Token`示例。

trans-unit.source: This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token.
trans-unit.target: 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，并包括一个实现被动 STS，能够为提供服务的 SWT 令牌。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，你可以参阅`Federation Metadata`示例。

trans-unit.source: For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些示例和信息提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows the implementation of a passive STS using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示被动 STS 的实现使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedPassiveSecurityTokenServiceOperations.ProcessRequest%28System.Web.HttpRequest%2CSystem.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal%2CSystem.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService%2CSystem.Web.HttpResponse%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何调用自定义的被动 STS 处理 WS 联合身份验证请求，通过调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedPassiveSecurityTokenServiceOperations.ProcessRequest%28System.Web.HttpRequest%2CSystem.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal%2CSystem.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService%2CSystem.Web.HttpResponse%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的代码后面`default.aspx.cs`文件。

trans-unit.source: You must override both the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken)" /> and the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken,System.IdentityModel.Scope)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你必须重写二者<see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken)" />和<see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken,System.IdentityModel.Scope)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the security token request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" />，表示安全令牌请求。

trans-unit.source: This includes the request message as well as other client related information such as authorization context.
trans-unit.target: 这包括请求消息和其他客户端相关信息，如授权上下文。

trans-unit.source: This is the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> object that was returned by the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> 方法的 <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken)" />参数返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method returns a collection of output subjects to be included in the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，此方法将返回要包括在颁发令牌中的输出主题的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> that contains the collection of claims that will be placed in the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> 包含放置在发布的安全标志上的声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> method is called from the token issuance pipeline, which is implemented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A>方法调用从令牌颁发管道，由实现<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It returns an <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> that contains the claims to include in the issued security token based on the requestor of the token (the `principal` parameter), the incoming RST (the `request` parameter), and the relying party for which the token is intended (the `scope` parameter).
trans-unit.target: 它将返回<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>，包含要包含在基于令牌请求者颁发的安全令牌中的声明 (`principal`参数)，传入的 RST (`request`参数)，并且该标记是为其信赖方应 （`scope`参数)。

trans-unit.source: The logic in this method is primarily concerned with answering the following questions:
trans-unit.target: 此方法中的逻辑主要关心的回答以下问题：

trans-unit.source: **Which claim types should be included in the response based on the RP for which it is intended?**
trans-unit.target: **哪种声明类型应包含在基于所针对的 RP 响应？**

trans-unit.source: Typically this is decided on a per-RP basis from lists of claim types required for each RP or on a per-request basis by examining the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.Claims%2A> property of the request.
trans-unit.target: 这通常通过检查决定每个 RP 根据从列表中的所需的每个 RP 的声明类型或基于每个请求<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.Claims%2A>的请求的属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the logic and details for determining the claims to include in the response is completely up to your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 但是的逻辑和用于确定要在响应中包含的声明的详细信息负责完全实现。

trans-unit.source: **Which claim values should be assigned to the claims in the response?**
trans-unit.target: **哪种声明值应分配到响应中的声明？**

trans-unit.source: For an Identity Provider (IP-STS) this typically means using one or more claims in the requestor’s <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> (provided by the `principal` parameter) to access a store (or other entity) to return values for the required claim types.
trans-unit.target: 对于标识提供程序 (IP STS)，这通常意味着在请求者的使用一个或多个声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>(由`principal`参数) 来访问应用商店 （或其他实体） 以返回所需的声明类型的值。

trans-unit.source: For a Federation Provider (R-STS) this typically means performing some kind of processing on the requestor’s incoming claims to fulfill the request; perhaps performing filtering or transformation on some claims presented by the requestor, while passing others through unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 对于联合身份验证提供程序 (R STS)，这通常意味着对请求者的传入声明，从而满足请求; 执行某种类型的处理可能对提供者，同时传递其他通过未修改某些声明执行筛选或转换。

trans-unit.source: Of course, as in the case of deciding which claims to include in the response, the details and logic of how to determine the values of these claims is up to your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当然，如下所示决定要在响应中包含的声明的情况下，在详细信息和如何确定这些声明的值的逻辑负责你的实现。

trans-unit.source: The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自`Custom Token`示例。

trans-unit.source: This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token.
trans-unit.target: 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，并包括一个实现被动 STS，能够为提供服务的 SWT 令牌。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，你可以参阅`Federation Metadata`示例。

trans-unit.source: For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些示例和信息提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> method to return claims for your STS.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何重写<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A>方法以返回声明的 STS。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the Request Security Token (RST) message is ignored and a collection of claims based on the user as authenticated at the STS is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，则忽略此请求安全令牌 (RST) 消息和返回的基于用户，在 STS 进行身份验证的声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in your implementation of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现该 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService" /> 类时，必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the incoming token request (RST).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> 表示传入标记请求 (RST)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> instance that encapsulates information about the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 封装有关该依赖的一方的信息的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the proof token to be included in the response (RSTR).
trans-unit.target: 获取要包含在响应（RETR) 内的证明标记。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ProofDescriptor" /> that represents the newly created proof descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ProofDescriptor" />，表示新建的证明说明符。

trans-unit.source: The proof descriptor can be an asymmetric proof descriptor, a symmetric proof descriptor, or <see langword="null" /> in the bearer token case.
trans-unit.target: 在持有者令牌情况下，证明描述符可以是非对称证明描述符、一个对称证明描述符或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the default token issuance pipeline implemented in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 从默认的令牌颁发管道实现中调用此方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns a proof descriptor or throws an appropriate exception.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回校验描述符或引发适当的异常。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the incoming token request (RST).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> 表示传入标记请求 (RST)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requestor's proof encrypting credentials.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求者的标记加密凭据。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials" /> object that represents the requestor’s encrypting credentials.
trans-unit.target: 表示请求者的加密凭据的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetProofToken%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用从<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetProofToken%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does the following.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现执行以下操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns `null` if there is no encryption token specified in the request (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.ProofEncryption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `null`).
trans-unit.target: 返回`null`不是否有任何请求中指定的加密令牌 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.ProofEncryption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`null`)。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if it can get the token as an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>, it returns credentials based on that token.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果它可以获取作为令牌<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>，它将返回基于该令牌的凭据。

trans-unit.source: If it cannot resolve the token as an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.RequestFailedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法解析作为令牌<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.RequestFailedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The RST that contains the token request.
trans-unit.target: 包含令牌请求的 RST。

trans-unit.source: The token descriptor that contains the information to use for the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 令牌描述符包含要用于颁发的令牌的信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates the response (RSTR) that contains the issued token by using the specified request (RST) and security token descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 创建响应 (RSTR)，它包含使用指定请求 (RST) 和安全令牌描述符颁发的令牌。

trans-unit.source: The response (RSTR) or <see langword="null" /> if a response cannot be created from the specified request and token descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 响应 (RSTR) 或 <see langword="null" />（如果无法从指定请求和令牌描述符创建响应）。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <see langword="null" /> if the <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回 <see langword="null" />（如果 <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetResponse%2A> method is called as the last step from the token issuance pipeline, which is implemented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetResponse%2A>从令牌颁发管道，由实现，最后一步调用方法，则<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It creates and returns the response (RSTR) by using the original incoming request (RST) and the token descriptor that was built up during previous steps in the token issuance pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 它创建，并通过使用原始的传入请求 (RST) 和令牌颁发管道中的上一个步骤期间建立的令牌描述符返回响应 (RSTR)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates the RSTR by passing the RST specified in the request parameter to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor, invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.ApplyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the token descriptor passed into <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetResponse%2A> to apply its properties to the newly created RSTR, setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.AppliesTo%2A> property on the RSTR by using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A> property on the token descriptor, and finally setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.ReplyTo%2A> property on the RSTR according to the following table:
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将通过将传入的请求参数中指定 RST 创建 RSTR<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数中，调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.ApplyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法令牌描述符传递给<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetResponse%2A>将其属性设置为新创建 RSTR，设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.AppliesTo%2A>属性使用 RSTR<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A>令牌描述符，属性和最后设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.ReplyTo%2A>上按下表 RSTR 属性：

trans-unit.source: `RST.ReplyTo` property
trans-unit.target: `RST.ReplyTo` 属性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性。

trans-unit.source: `RSTR.ReplyTo` property
trans-unit.target: `RSTR.ReplyTo` 属性

trans-unit.source: Set
trans-unit.target: Set

trans-unit.source: Not Set
trans-unit.target: 未设置

trans-unit.source: Not Set
trans-unit.target: 未设置

trans-unit.target: Set

trans-unit.source: Set
trans-unit.target: Set

trans-unit.source: Not Set
trans-unit.target: 未设置

trans-unit.target: Set

trans-unit.source: Not Set
trans-unit.target: 未设置

trans-unit.source: Not Set
trans-unit.target: 未设置

trans-unit.source: Not Set
trans-unit.target: 未设置

trans-unit.source: Not Set
trans-unit.target: 未设置

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" /> that represents the client making the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" />，表示客户发出请求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the incoming request (RST).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> 表示传入请求 (RST)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> object that contains information about the relying party (RP) associated with the specified request (RST).
trans-unit.target: 获取包含与指定请求（RST）关联的依赖方（RP）信息的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in your implementation of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现该 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService" /> 类时，必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> that encapsulates the RP information associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> 封装与请求关联的 RP 信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> method is called from the token issuance pipeline after the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A> method and should return a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope> object configured for the incoming request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>从令牌颁发管道后调用方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A>方法，应返回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope>为传入的请求配置的对象。

trans-unit.source: (The token issuance pipeline is implemented in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.) The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope> object encapsulates information about the RP associated with the security token request (RST).
trans-unit.target: (在中实现令牌颁发管道<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法。)<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope>对象封装有关 RP 与安全令牌请求 (RST) 相关联的信息。

trans-unit.source: This includes information about the encrypting and signing credentials to be used with the RP and whether or not to encrypt any issued tokens and/or symmetric keys in the response.
trans-unit.target: 这包括有关要用于 RP 和加密任何已颁发的令牌和/或响应中的对称密钥的加密和签名凭据的信息。

trans-unit.source: Some typical tasks performed in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> method are:
trans-unit.target: 在中执行一些典型任务<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>方法是：

trans-unit.source: Determine whether the RP for which the token is intended is a recognized RP.
trans-unit.target: 确定令牌所针对的 RP 是否识别的 RP。

trans-unit.source: How this is accomplished depends on your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如何完成此操作取决于您的实现。

trans-unit.source: If the intended RP is not a valid RP for this STS, then the method should throw an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.InvalidRequestException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果预期的 RP 不是此 STS 有效 RP，则该方法应引发<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.InvalidRequestException>。

trans-unit.source: Determine the signing credentials to be used in the response (RSTR) and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SigningCredentials%2A> property accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 确定要用于响应 (RSTR) 和设置的签名凭据<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SigningCredentials%2A>属性相应地。

trans-unit.source: Determine whether the response and/or any included symmetrical keys should be encrypted and the credentials to be used for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否应加密响应和/或任何包含的对称密钥以及要用于加密的凭据。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A> properties accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>属性相应地。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A> properties are set `true` to prevent the STS from issuing tokens that are not secure.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>属性设置`true`以防止 STS 颁发是不安全的令牌。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that these properties never be set to `false` in a production environment.
trans-unit.target: 建议永远不会设置这些属性`false`在生产环境中。

trans-unit.source: Determine the address to which the response should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 确定应返回响应的地址。

trans-unit.source: Set either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.AppliesToAddress%2A> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A> property accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.AppliesToAddress%2A>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A>属性相应地。

trans-unit.source: The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自`Custom Token`示例。

trans-unit.source: This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token.
trans-unit.target: 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，并包括一个实现被动 STS，能够为提供服务的 SWT 令牌。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，你可以参阅`Federation Metadata`示例。

trans-unit.source: For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些示例和信息提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an implementation of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示 <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> 方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: This implementation verifies that the RP is recognized by the STS, validates the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.ReplyTo%2A> address in the request and sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property accordingly, and sets the signing and encrypting credentials to use with the RP based on certificates that are hard-coded in the file.
trans-unit.target: 此实现验证，RP 识别的 STS，验证<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.ReplyTo%2A>地址中的请求和集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性相应地，并设置进行签名和加密凭据将用于 RP 根据证书在文件中采用硬编码。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in your implementation of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现该 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService" /> 类时，必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the requested token type URI.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含请求的令牌类型 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the appropriate security token handler for issuing a security token of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 获取适合保护指定类型的安全令牌的安全令牌处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> that represents the token handler to be used for creating the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于创建发布的安全标志的标志处理程序的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if the requested token type is not supported (there is no handler configured for the specified token type).
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的标记类型不受支持（没有为指定的标记类型配置处理程序），则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation if `requestedTokenType` is `null` or an empty string, the default token type from configuration is used.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现中如果`requestedTokenType`是`null`或空字符串，使用从配置的令牌类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DefaultTokenType%2A> property of the STS configuration object accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这通过指定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DefaultTokenType%2A>通过访问 STS 配置对象的属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the default token issuance pipeline implemented in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 从默认的令牌颁发管道实现中调用此方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime" /> that represents the requested lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime" />，表示所请求的生存周期。

trans-unit.source: Gets the lifetime for the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 获取颁发的令牌的生存期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime" /> that represents the granted lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示授予生存期的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is normally called with the lifetime that arrived in the RST.
trans-unit.target: 与在 RST 中，传入的生存期通常调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, the token lifetime is calculated according to the following table.
trans-unit.target: 在默认实现中，令牌生存期是下表根据计算的。

trans-unit.source: Created (in)
trans-unit.target: 创建 （中）

trans-unit.source: Expires (in)
trans-unit.target: 过期 （中）

trans-unit.source: Created (in)
trans-unit.target: 创建 （中）

trans-unit.source: Expires (out)
trans-unit.target: 过期 （出）

trans-unit.source: C
trans-unit.target: C

trans-unit.source: C
trans-unit.target: C

trans-unit.source: C + <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: C + <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: C
trans-unit.target: C

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: C
trans-unit.target: C

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the default token issuance pipeline implemented in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 从默认的令牌颁发管道实现中调用此方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" /> that represents the identity of the token requestor.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" />，表示令牌请求者的标识。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the security token request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" />，表示安全令牌请求。

trans-unit.source: This includes the request message as well as other client related information such as authorization context.
trans-unit.target: 这包括请求消息和其他客户端相关信息，如授权上下文。

trans-unit.source: Issues a security token.
trans-unit.target: 发出安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" /> that contains the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 包含发布的安全标识的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" />。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the Issue binding defined in the WS-Trust specification.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 Ws-trust 规范中定义的问题绑定。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method processes the incoming request (RST) through a token issuance (claims issuance) pipeline and returns either a response (RSTR) that contains a security token with the appropriate claims to authenticate the requestor with the RP or an appropriate exception.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法处理传入请求 (RST) 通过令牌颁发 （声明发出） 管道并返回任一响应 (RSTR)，其中包含具有相应声明进行身份验证的安全令牌请求者 RP 或相应的异常。

trans-unit.source: The token issuance pipeline in the default implementation consists of calls to the following methods (of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class).
trans-unit.target: 令牌颁发管道中的默认实现包含对以下方法的调用 (的<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>类)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A> method to validate the request (RST).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A>方法验证请求 (RST)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> method to get a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope> object that contains information about the relying party (RP) associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope>包含与请求关联的信赖方 (RP) 有关的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> returns `null`, a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>返回`null`、<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.CreateSecurityTokenDescriptor%2A> method to return a security token descriptor based on the RST and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope> object returned in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.CreateSecurityTokenDescriptor%2A>方法以返回安全令牌描述符基于 RST 和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope>上一步中返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: The security token descriptor (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor>) contains information about the request in a form that can be used by a token handler.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌描述符 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor>) 包含有关可由标记处理程序的窗体中的请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.SecurityTokenDescriptor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to the descriptor returned by the call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.SecurityTokenDescriptor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为调用所返回的描述符。

trans-unit.source: If `null` is returned or if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.SigningCredentials%2A> property of the descriptor is `null`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`null`返回或如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.SigningCredentials%2A>属性的描述符是`null`、<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The exception is also thrown if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true` but the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.EncryptingCredentials%2A> property on the returned descriptor is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果也会引发异常<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`true`但<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.EncryptingCredentials%2A>属性返回的描述符`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetSecurityTokenHandler%2A> method to get the appropriate token handler based on the kind of token requested.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetSecurityTokenHandler%2A>方法以获取适当的令牌处理程序根据请求标记的类型。

trans-unit.source: If `null` is returned, a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`null`返回，<xref:System.NotImplementedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetIssuerName%2A> method to get the issuer name for the token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetIssuerName%2A>方法以获取令牌的颁发者名称。

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the name is `null` or empty; otherwise sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.TokenIssuerName%2A> property on the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果名称是`null`或为空; 否则，将设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.TokenIssuerName%2A>有关描述符的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetTokenLifetime%2A> method to get the lifetime for the token and sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A> property on the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetTokenLifetime%2A>方法以获取的令牌和集的生存期<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A>有关描述符的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetProofToken%2A> method to get the proof token to include in the issued token and sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Proof%2A> property on the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetProofToken%2A>方法以获取证明令牌包含在已颁发的令牌以及集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Proof%2A>有关描述符的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> method to get the claims to include in the issued token and sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A> property on the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A>方法以获取要包括在颁发的令牌和集的声明<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A>有关描述符的属性。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetResponse%2A> method to create a response (RSTR) that contains the issued token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetResponse%2A>方法来创建包含已颁发的令牌的响应 (RSTR)。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method to implement a custom token issuance pipeline; however this is typically not necessary in the development and test environments for which most custom implementations of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class are intended.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法来实现一个自定义令牌颁发管道; 但是它通常不需要在开发和测试环境中的哪些最自定义实现<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>类旨在。

trans-unit.source: In many of these cases you override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> methods and optionally override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A> method to provide a serviceable STS for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 在许多这类情况你重写<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetOutputClaimsIdentity%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>方法和选择重写<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A>方法来为你的环境提供可维修 STS。

trans-unit.source: If further customization is necessary you can often provide it by overriding the methods that implement each stage of the default token issuance pipeline listed above.
trans-unit.target: 是否需要进一步执行自定义你通常可以通过重写实现令牌颁发管道上面列出的默认值的每个阶段的方法提供它。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the principal associated with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与当前实例关联的主体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" /> that represents the current principal.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前主体的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" /> that represents the identity of the token requestor.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" />，表示令牌请求者的标识。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the security token request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" />，表示安全令牌请求。

trans-unit.source: This includes the request message as well as other client related information such as authorization context.
trans-unit.target: 这包括请求消息和其他客户端相关信息，如授权上下文。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, processes a WS-Trust Renew request.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，处理 WS 信任续订请求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" /> that represents the RSTR to return to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 表示 RSTR 返回到调用程序的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method throws an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.InvalidRequestException>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现将引发<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.InvalidRequestException>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security token request (RST) associated with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要与当前实例关联的安全性标记请求 （RST) 。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" />，包含请求。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope associated with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与当前实例关联的范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> that represents the configuration for the token issuance request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Scope" /> 表示令牌颁发请求的配置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor" /> associated with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与当前 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor" /> 实例关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The security token descriptor that is associated with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 与当前实例关联的安全性标记请求 （RST) 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <see langword="null" /> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the owner configuration instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例所有者的配置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration" /> that contains the configuration for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration" />，包含当前实例的配置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" /> that represents the identity of the token requestor.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal" />，表示令牌请求者的标识。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the security token request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" />，表示安全令牌请求。

trans-unit.source: This includes the request message as well as other client related information such as authorization context.
trans-unit.target: 这包括请求消息和其他客户端相关信息，如授权上下文。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, processes a WS-Trust Validate request.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，处理 WS 信任验证请求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" /> that represents the RSTR to return to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 表示 RSTR 返回到调用程序的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method throws an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.InvalidRequestException>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现将引发<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.InvalidRequestException>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" /> that represents the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示请求的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates the security token request (RST) encapsulated by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 确认该事例 (RST) 封装的安全标记的请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A> method is called from the token issuance pipeline (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method) to validate the incoming RST.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.ValidateRequest%2A>从令牌颁发管道调用方法 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法) 来验证传入的 RST。

trans-unit.source: The RST is validated against the requirements (policy) of the STS and an appropriate exception is thrown if it is not valid.
trans-unit.target: RST 验证对 STS 的要求 （策略），并且如果它不是有效引发相应的异常。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class supports only the RST-RSTR pattern and only the Issue binding of the WS-Trust specification (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.RequestType%2A> property of the request must be set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestTypes.Issue?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>类支持仅 RST RSTR 模式和 Ws-trust 规范的问题绑定 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.RequestType%2A>的请求的属性必须设置为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestTypes.Issue?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method enforces these requirements (and others noted in the exceptions section).
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现强制执行这些需求 （和其他异常部分中所述）。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method if you must enforce different validation requirements for your custom STS.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须强制实施不同的验证要求你自定义 STS，您可以重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.RequestType" /> property of the request is not set to <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestTypes.Issue" />.
trans-unit.target: 请求的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.RequestType" /> 属性未设置为 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestTypes.Issue" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.KeyType" /> property of the request is not <see langword="null" /> or one of the constants defined in the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.KeyTypes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 请求的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.KeyType" /> 属性不是在 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.KeyTypes" /> 类中定义的 <see langword="null" /> 或某个常数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.KeyType" /> of the request is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.KeyTypes.Bearer" /> and the <see langword="KeySize" /> element is present, but its value is not equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 请求的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.KeyType" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.KeyTypes.Bearer" />，并且 <see langword="KeySize" /> 元素存在，但其值不为零。

trans-unit.source: The STS does not support the request token type (based on the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.TokenType" /> property of the request).
trans-unit.target: STS 不支持请求令牌的类型 (基于请求的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.TokenType" /> 属性的值)。
